RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALL PAUL broke alertly and went straight to the front, moved in early then showed the way on the inside of the runner-up, drew off in tandem with that foe while in the two path on the turn, was put to a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, shook clear inside the furlong marker, was given a pop of a down-turned crop near the sixteenth-pole and extended the advantage under steady urging to the finish. QUIET WISDOM broke in and hit the gate, moved up to press the pace on the outside of the winner, opened up in unison with that foe while in the three path on the turn, drifted in some while battling outside that opponent under a right-handed crop in upper stretch, lost touch while weakening outside the sixteenth-pole and proved no match while able to safely secure the place. STRAWBERRY KWIK moved out while hard ridden, dropped back near the nine-sixteenths then shifted further out, went three then two wide on the turn, kept on while dropping to the rail in the final furlong and earned the show. APOLLO CODE chased the pace under strong urging, dropped back while climbing some leaving the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, was driven three wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. STORMY'S DREAMING broke in and was slow into stride, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. MAMA'S MIDDIE broke out at the start, was urged along off the pace, moved in near the nine-sixteenths, went two then three wide on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. GUCCI MAN broke a step slow, was hard ridden near the back on the outside, went three then four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy's Dreaming
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,slow to stride,urged,inside turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Apollo Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,drop back climbed 7/16,ins turn,3w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Strawberry Kwik
ENTRY.OWNER: Torelli Stacy and Ivery Sisters Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out,hard ridden,drop back4-1/2,3-2p turn,kept on,earn3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Tall Paul
ENTRY.OWNER: Pegram Michael E Watson Karl and Weitman Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk well,mvd in,pace ins foe,2p turn,shook clr ins1/8,stdy urging

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Middie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,urged along,mvd in 4-1/2,2-3p turn,4p1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Gucci Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Ravin Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slw,hard ridden outside,3-4w turn,5w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,hit gate,press out,3p turn,dueled,wknd,clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 5 1/2F Turf CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD LORD LORRIE got forced to steady after the start conceding one to two lengths of ground when SMOKEY SMOKEY tucked directly in front from the outside, chased just off the inside from mid pack patiently handled until set down angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge inside the final furlong overhauled the leader a sixteenth out in tandem with the runner up, then edged away from that rival in the late stages to prevail. SMOKEY SMOKEY tucked to be just off the inside in closest aim of the leader forcing both GOOD LORD LORRIE and ALL ABOUT TONITE to steady after the start, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung two to three wide into upper stretch, ran on with good energy to overthrow the leader in concert with the aforementioned foe, then got shaken off in the late going to the finish while clear for the place honors. OCEAN MERMAID (GB) established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, got let out taking the two path into upper stretch, inched away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and was overhauled a sixteenth from home, kept on to preserve the show honors safely on the wire. REVEREND MOON coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside from the pocket, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, took to the inside straightened away, dug in under a drive tipping out to the three path a sixteenth from home and weakened in the late stages. ALL ABOUT TONITE got steadied after the start conceding two lengths of position when SMOKEY SMOKEY tucked in front, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide for home and passed tired rivals. BETTER LUCK coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. KING JULIEN a bit reluctant to load prior to the start, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and tired. REVELATORY chased just off the inside growing detached at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. FAST STRIDE broke in a step at the start, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: All About Tonite
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied after st, chased 2p, ins turn, 2-3w upper, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Better Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Revelatory
ENTRY.OWNER: St Elias Stable Langone Ken Duncker C Steven and Vicarage Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Reverend Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, 2w 1/4p, to ins str away, tip 3w, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Good Lord Lorrie
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady after st, chased 2p, set down 5w upper, up 1/16, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in step st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Smokey Smokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p in aim, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, ran on, good energy

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Mermaid (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, let out 2w 1/4p, inched away, caught 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: King Julien
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, angled 4-5w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SA FORADADA was bumped soundly at the start, saved ground while well placed in the second flight, was given her cue near the five-sixteenths, made a rail bid when the pacesetter came off the inside into upper stretch, fought inside of three foes under strong handling into the final furlong, took the lead outside the sixteenth-pole and prevailed while drifting out at the finish. FREUDIAN was reserved in the two path on the first turn, settled near the rear on the backstretch, moved closer while shifting from three to five wide on the final turn, was roused late on that bend, rallied to make an outside bid outside the furlong marker, swapped back to her inside lead at the sixteenth-pole, fought outside of three foes to the finish and missed but earned the place. JOLLY MISS JILL broke out and bumped soundly with a foe, went to the front, showed the way on the inside while in hand, was asked near the quarter-pole then spun into the two path into upper stretch, lost the advantage inside the furlong marker and was outfinished while able to get the show. MURSAL bumped with a rival at the start, went three wide on the first turn, settled outside in the second flight, ranged up in the four path on the far turn then made a bid near the five-sixteenths, dropped to the three path into upper stretch, battled under a drive into the final sixteenth and was out-kicked. ICY REPLY went around the first turn in the two path, prompted the leader on the outside, vied in the three path on the far turn, dropped back at the quarter-pole and weakened. YOGI bumped with an opponent at the start, went four wide on the first turn, settled outside at the back, was urged along late on the backstretch, went four then three wide on the far turn and failed to respond. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE STRETCH RUN, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Miss Jill
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd soundly,ins pace,ask1/4,2p,headed ins1/8,outfinshd

ENTRY.NAME: Sa Foradada
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd soundly brk,well placed ins,ask5/16,rail bid,lead1/16,held

ENTRY.NAME: Freudian
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 2p1st,settled,3-5w2nd,roused1/4,bid1/8,fought,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,prompted outside,vied 3p2nd turn,drop back1/4,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mursal
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi, Vincent S. and Gabrielle Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3w1st,settled out,bid 4p2nd turn,3p1/4,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Yogi
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,4w1st,settled outside,urged1/2,4-3p2nd turn,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 64000. (UP TO $11,136 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEN CENT TOWN four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch just off the leader, tucked three wide advancing to latch on the leader with seven-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took over command spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to inside the eighth pole, then got geared down late with the race sewn up and held on to prevail. THUNDERIAN chased two then three wide coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, closed well outside but missed at the end. DANGEROUS RIDE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. KUPP was inspired by GABE growing fractious in the gate and grew fractious himself busting open the stall door and attempting to run off save for the strong hold of the assistant starter, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide for home, offered up a bid but was outkicked. COMMERCE COMET hustled from the gate intent on the front, got coaxed along on the pace just off the inside coming under pressure from the eventual winner seven-sixteenths from home, yielded the front and took the inside route into upper stretch, got flashed the crop to the off side when used up and weakened to the finish. GABE grew fractious in the gate leaping up and inspired a pair to do so to his outside, chased three wide forwardly placed early on, got shaken off near the seven-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Dangerous Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderian
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, closed well, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Commerce Comet
ENTRY.OWNER: Rockingham Ranch and Talla Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, coaxed on pace 2p, yielded ins 1/4, used up, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Gabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious, leapt up gate, chased 3w, 3-4w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Kupp
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious, brk thru gate, chased 3-4w, 5w upper, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Cent Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, advanced 3w turn, up 2w 1/4p, clear, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DETERMINISTIC played up in the post parade, was off slow then came in behind a skirmish in front, climbed some under urging outside the five-eighths, went three wide early on the turn then angled five wide in the vicinity of the five-sixteenths, bumped with a rival while six wide into upper stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong and closed strongly to get up late and prevail. HURRICANE NELSON bumped with a rival at the start, angled out early, tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid near the seven-sixteenths, vied in the two path on the turn, was asked near the five-sixteenths, took the lead in the three path into upper stretch, shook clear under one pop of a right-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths, was switched to a left-handed crop at the furlong marker, led into the final sixteenth but was caught while clear for the place in a good effort. ELIMINATE bumped twice with a rival at the start, settled off the inside, was asked in the two path early on the turn, angled four wide near the five-sixteenths, bumped with foes while five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while able to safely secure the show. INFORMED PATRIOT veered in at the start and bumped with a foe, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, was asked outside the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage into upper stretch and weakened. RIDGEWOOD RUNNER was bumped at the start then forced into another opponent, settled on the outside, was roused in the three path on the turn, bumped with a rival while four wide into the stretch, chased into the final furlong and came up empty. REYNOLDS CHANNEL broke in then was hustled, established a good position just off the pace, was asked while moving from the rail to the two path on the turn, shifted three wide into the stretch under a drive, dropped back into the final furlong and capitulated. CHAPERONE bumped twice with a rival at the start and bobbled then was taken up multiple times, spotted the front many lengths, went around the turn in the two path and was no factor. NULLIFY played up in the post parade, was bumped at the start and forced into another foe then taken up, settled on the outside, went four then five wide past the three-eighths pole, dropped to the three then two path late on the bend, turned into the stretch along the rail and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Eliminate
ENTRY.OWNER: Spendthrift Farm LLC and Repole Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd twice brk,settled,ask2-4p turn,bmpd5w btwn1/4,earned3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Chaperone
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd twice brk,bobbld,takn up multiple times,2path turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Reynolds Channel
ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,hustled,well placed,ask ins-2p turn,3p1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Hurricane Nelson
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,mvd out,trckd out,bid7/16,2p turn,led 3p3/16,clr,caught

ENTRY.NAME: Deterministic
ENTRY.OWNER: St Elias Stable Langone Ken Duncker C Steven and Vicarage Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,urged,climbed some5/8,3-5w turn,bmpd 6w1/4,rallied,up

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgewood Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced into foe,settled out,ask 3p turn,bmpd 4p1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Nullify
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced in,tkn up,urged outside,4-5path,2p5/16,rail,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Informed Patriot
ENTRY.OWNER: Robison J Kirk and Robison Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer in brk,bmpd,pace,ins turn,headed into upper stretch,weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RICHIES PRINCESS established the front just after the initial stride from the break and spurted away two to three wide down the backstretch, went just off the inside through the turn holding clear command and swung three wide into upper stretch, drifted in a path near the three-sixteenths, then shied out inside the eighth pole three to four paths before being corrected with a stiff left rein a sixteenth from home and held safe to the finish to prevail. NOLITA chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, drifted in slightly straightened away, then followed the shying out leader out two paths inside the eighth pole before altering in a path a sixteenths from home and finished willingly to latch on that rival as she hit the finish. FOXY CARA hustled from the gate, chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. BETTER HUMOR ME coaxed from the gate, raced forwardly placed five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went four to five wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish and just got bested for the show honors in the final jumps. MIM six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. IRISH CRYSTAL chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. NEIGH JUDE got bumped at the start by SWEET LIBERTY, who broke outwards, chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no headway. SOUFFLE coaxed from the gate, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coaxed along from three furlongs out, went five to six wide into upper stretch and tired. SWEET LIBERTY broke out at the start bumping NEIGH JUDE, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. DREAM ON CARA chased along the inside under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung two to three wide for home, made no impact. BE BEST chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired, and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Dream On Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 1/2, 2-3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Foxy Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, 6-7w backstretch, 3w turn, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Nolita
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w upper, altered in 1/16, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Be Best
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable Swick Stable and Smart Choice Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 7/16, inside 1/4, tired, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC Jacoutot Peter and Paradise Farms Corp
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Neigh Jude
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Better Humor Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, forwardly placed 5w, 3w turn, 4-5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Crystal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Mim
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3-4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Souffle
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5w, coaxed 3w 3/8, 5-6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Richies Princess
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Ravin Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: spurted away 2-3w, 2p turn, 3w uppr, shied out, held safe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Galway S. SARATOGA RACE 7 5 1/2F Turf CR: 95. Stakes Purse 150000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: L J'S EMMA broke out a bit at the start, settled on the inside of a rival, went two then three wide on the turn, shifted four wide into the stretch, rallied outside while swapping leads back and forth multiple times and closed well to get up late and prevail. STONE SILENT moved in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked for her best in upper stretch, led under the crop into the final sixteenth, swapped back to her inside lead late and was denied while clear for the place. ISABEL ALEXANDRA (IRE) was well placed just off the pace, raced between horses in the two path on the turn, came under a drive in upper stretch, chased into the final furlong and lacked the needed kick while just able to get the show. LOVE APPEALS moved out while under tight restraint just off heels, settled more kindly late on the backstretch, went three then two wide on the turn, bumped with a rival inside the five-sixteenths, moved out while still on her inside lead in upper stretch, came between foes into the final furlong, swapped to the proper lead late and just missed the show. REDIFINED was last away then taken in hand while in tight between foes after the start, settled near the rear, went two to three wide for most of the turn then shifted four wide and improved position while unable to threaten then was reported to have bled. REFLEXIVITY (IRE) angled in then settled on the outside with some cover, was roused three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. LOVE REIGNS (IRE) settled towards the rear on the outside, was roused four then five wide on the turn and failed to impact. BEAUTY OF THE SEA broke in and bumped with an opponent then was hustled, chased the pace on the inside, saved ground on the turn and came up empty. MY SWEET AFFAIR tracked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the turn, chased the runner-up under a drive into the final furlong and tired. DREAM CONCERT bumped with a rival at the start, was taken up in traffic near the nine-sixteenths, saved ground on the turn, bumped with a foe inside the five-sixteenths then checked in tight against the rail and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Concert
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tkn up 4-1/2,ins turn,bmpd ins 5/16,checked,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Beauty of the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,hustled,chased,inside turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Isabel Alexandra (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Restrepo Ramiro OGMA Investments LLC Global Racing Stables LLC and Inverdeco Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,ask btwn foes 2p turn,chased,lckd needed kick,earn3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Love Appeals
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight off heels,mvd out,3-2p turn,bmpd ins5/16,mvd out,improvd

ENTRY.NAME: Redifined
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,in tight,drop back,2-4path turn,improved,bled

ENTRY.NAME: L J's Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,settled ins foe,2-3p turn,4p1/4,rallied,up final 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Love Reigns (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, 4-5wide turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Silent
ENTRY.OWNER: Talla Racing and West Point Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,showed way,2p turn,responded,led past 1/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: My Sweet Affair
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Gatsas Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,asked 3path turn,chased,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Reflexivity (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,settled outside,3wide turn,4w1/4,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Herb Moelis Memorial Saratoga Special S. - Grade2 SARATOGA RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS. This is a Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $200 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,000 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstake allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 29, 2023 with 20 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RHYME SCHEMES broke in at the start bumping EDIFIED solidly into HAUL, raced four then three wide in pursuit from just off the pace, advanced on the front under light coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide into upper stretch taking over command, went clear under a light drive before being placed back in hand inside the eighth pole and prevailed well clear and comfortably to the wire. MARKET STREET established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside under pressure from WOODCOURT to the outside, tucked inside half a mile from home and came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch and was overhauled from the front by the top one, proved no match through the stretch while running on determinedly to preserve the place honors. HAUL broke out at the start bumping EDIFIED into RHYME SCHEMES, then had that middle rival reverberate off that foe and was bumped and steadied conceding four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and showed good courage to secure the show honors. LASSO chased along the inside down the backstretch before tipping to the two path half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened. EDIFIED got bumped solidly at the start by HAUL breaking out and bounced into RHYME SCHEMES breaking inwards, bounced off that rival and bumped again solidly with HAUL getting pinballed around at the start and forced to steady, conceded five to six lengths to the front as a result, chased three wide under hustling, went four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. WOODCOURT away sharply to the front, prompted the pace of MARKET STREET to the outside four then three wide down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, came under brief coaxed five-sixteenths from home before being eased up on to back away between foes taking the two path into upper stretch, folded and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Lasso
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, tipped 2p 1/2, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Market Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 1/2,coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Woodcourt
ENTRY.OWNER: Qatar Racing Detampel Marc and Galvin Fergus
ENTRY.COMMENT: away to front, prompted 4-3w, 2p turn, eased 2w 1/4p, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Haul
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and St Elias Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, bumped, steady st, chased 5-4w, 4w upper, good courage

ENTRY.NAME: Edified
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped 3x, steadied st, chased 3w, 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rhyme Schemes
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 4-3w pursuit, up 2-3w uppr, went clear, comfortably

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Fourstardave H. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Inner turf CR: 113. Stakes Purse 500000. INNER TURF A HANDICAP FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASA CREED went three wide on the first turn, was carried out onto the backstretch, settled outside without the benefit of cover, was roused with three furlongs to run, traveled three wide on the far turn, was put to the crop in upper stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong, closed determinedly to make a bid outside the sixteenth-pole, took the lead in the final sixteenth and prevailed under strong urging. ANNAPOLIS established a forward position between foes down the initial straightaway then was eased back, saved ground on the first turn, came out entering the backstretch, settled outside without cover, ranged up in the two path on the final turn, made a bid at the five-sixteenths, spun four wide into the stretch then took the lead at the three-sixteenths, led under a drive to the sixteenth-pole but was caught while just able to get the place. ICE CHOCOLAT (BRZ) was taken in hand while outside foes early, steadied while carried out by a rank rival into the first turn then dropped to the inside, was unhurried at the rear, saved ground while roused on the far turn, moved to the two path outside the quarter-pole, came four wide into the stretch, angled out at the three-sixteenths then drifted further out before being straightened, found his best stride in the final furlong and finished fast to just miss the place while clear for the show. MY SEA COTTAGE (IRE) was hustled to the front, showed the way on the inside, was roused late on the far turn, lost the advantage to the runner-up in upper stretch, battled inside that foe under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. EMMANUEL rounded the first turn in the two path, settled off the inside on the backstretch, was asked while two to three wide on the far turn, came under the crop in upper stretch and failed to rally. FULL SCREEN became rank when taken under restraint early, tossed his head nearing the first turn then swerved out, went three to four wide going around that bend, was reserved towards the rear, moved from the two path to the four path under urging on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch, drifted in inside the three-sixteenths and was no factor. SO HIGH (GB) was hustled from the gate, rounded the first turn in the two path, came up empty under urging along the hedge on the far turn and dropped out.

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,ask2-3p2nd turn,lacked needed response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 101. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHILENO chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command seventy yards from home, then inched away to the finish to prevail. ICE ROAD four then three wide early on in mid pack, bumped WHAT'S UP DOC twice pushing that foe to the rail in behind the leader and took over sole possession of the two path, advanced to prompt the front five furlongs from home, took over command at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was collared seventy yards from the finish, kept on to preserve the place honors. ORDER OF MAGNITUDE broke a half a beat slow and lost his lane to rivals, chased along the inside down the backstretch before tipping three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. MISTICAL CURLIN hustled from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. FORREST CITY forwardly placed three wide, got taken hold of and was eased off the pace of GUT FEELING six furlongs from home, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cornered two to three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. CICCIOBELLO five wide in pursuit throughout, got coaxed along three furlongs from home, continued five wide into upper stretch, came up empty. WHAT'S UP DOC coaxed from the gate, raced just off the inside early on, got bumped twice and was nudged to the rail in behind GUT FEELING by ICE ROAD who wanted the two path more, chased along the inside coming under coaxing with seven-sixteenths to go, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened. MEMPHIS chased four to five paths off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch, made no impact, and was eased home to the wire. GUT FEELING coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside initially under some pressure from FORREST CITY before that rival backed off six furlongs from home, and then came under pressure from ICE ROAD with five furlongs remaining, got placed to coaxing near the five-sixteenths when headed for command, took the inside route into upper stretch, folded, and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Gut Feeling
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed headed 5/16, ins 1/4, folded, ease

ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slow, chased ins, coaxed 3w 3/8, 7-8w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2p early, bumped 2x 3/4p, ins, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 11 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 88. Allowance Purse 95000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPINNING COLORS was away awkwardly then brushed with an opponent, bumped with a rival into the first turn, settled on the inside, was roused on the far turn, swung four wide into the stretch, rallied outside to get the lead inside the furlong marker then moved clear under strong handling. STELLA MARS settled on the inside, was asked on the far turn, shifted three wide into the stretch, gained to take a short and brief lead at the furlong marker then was outfinished while clear for the place. RHEAUME was hustled from the gate, traveled around the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, saved ground on the far turn, was asked while cutting the corner into the stretch, gained into a good striking position, chased into the final furlong and flattened out while able to get the show. WATERVILLE brushed with rivals at the start, was taken back between horses early, saved ground on the first turn, was unhurried at the rear, rounded the far turn in the two path, was roused at the quarter-pole then gained into a reasonable striking position, moved out near the sixteenth-pole and lacked the needed response then missed the show. LADY JASMINE went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked on the far turn, battled under a drive in upper stretch, lost the lead at the furlong marker and weakened. SOLIB was hustled from the gate, stalked the pace on the outside in the two path, was asked on the far turn, fought under a drive into the final furlong and tired. GALLEY HEAD brushed with an opponent at the start, bumped with a rival into the first turn, settled in the two to three path, was asked on the final turn, swung six wide into the stretch and failed to rally. ROBYN AND ELI bumped with a rival while off a step slow, went four wide on the first turn, settled outside without cover, was roused three to four wide on the far turn, swung seven wide into the stretch and came up empty. PHOTON was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, tracked the pace on the outside in the three path, was given her cue on the far turn, chased four wide into the stretch and capitulated. LATEST EDITION became extremely rank under steadying restraint early, continued very rank under steadying restraint while two to three wide through the first turn, was reserved while tugging at the bit, went two to three wide while asked on the far turn and came up empty.
